item.description:
BLIFF continues to reveal the passion, secrets and flavors of the Latino Culture.

Friday MENU is a picturesque and delicious one. Starting the evening with a documentary about the secrets of the Peruvian Cuisine (Cooking up Dreams). A delicious adventure inside the kitchens of those who are now exposing to the world what happens when you put some Inca tradition in your dishes, and get creative. If you are not a fan already of Peruvian food, get ready...
Website:http://www.guarango.t...

For the sport romantics; what is more passionate than a soccer match at La Boca with some Tango? Argentinian Soccer Club is a documentary about the delirium of those who were born to have faith in the "goles" in Argentina, one of the biggest soccer Mecas, and believers.

At 9:30 pm., El Muro "...shows the human and environmental consequences of the border fence between Tijuana and San Diego. Along the way it visits the reasons for the fence with local and global perspectives on its effectiveness. Migrants, deportees, minutemen, coyotes, environmentalists, writers, and academics all lend their experience and perspective in terms of human rights, democracy, NAFTA, globalization..."

For tickets, trailers and more info: http://bliff.org/...

Movies have English Subtitles

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: De Ollas Y Suenos (Cooking up Dreams)
